title: Galaxy S22 demand is at an ‘all-time high’ as shipping dates quickly slip to April for some models
content:
Between shortages and shipping delays, it’s no surprise when newly released products have long shipping times. However, just days ahead of their formal release, the shipping dates for Samsung’s new Galaxy S22 series are slipping quickly.

more…

The post Galaxy S22 demand is at an ‘all-time high’ as shipping dates quickly slip to April for some models appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Due to high demand, pre-order dates for the Galaxy S22 series are slipping drastically, as far back as April and May for some models.
